courseDetail: Get all the essential information about the IELTS and the most effective preparation tips from an ex-IELTS examiner
Get all the essential information about spoken and the most effective preparation tips from an ex-spoken examiner
Get all the essential information about the PTE and the most effective preparation tips from an ex-PTE examiner
In this course, you will improve your English pronunciation skills and learn about speaking English in today's globalised world.
In this course, you will improve your French skills and learn about speaking French in today's globalised world.
In this course, you will improve your Chinese skills and learn about speaking Chinese in today's globalised world.
In this course, you will improve your Japanese skills and learn about speaking Japanese in today's globalised world.
In this course, you will improve your  Phonetics skills and learn about Phonetics in today's globalised world.
